markdown:
**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 44 If your archetype has a feat that gives you advanced undead benefits, you gain the following. **Darkvision**: You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) if you don't already have it.
**Greater Disease and Poison Protection**: Your bonus against [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) and [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) increases to +2. You gain poison resistance equal to half your level.
**Paralysis and Sleep Protection**: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws (or any other defense) against effects that would make you [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) or have the [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) trait.
name: Advanced Undead Benefits
